I am currently working on a terraforming mod that lets you moddify planetary parameters (like the atmosphere and oceans) on runntime( I realy hope that I can get it to work put it looks good) using dedicated terraforming parts. When it is finnished it will basicaly allow you to terraform an entire planet and change it to be in a state that best suits your needs (very dense atmosphere with oxygen for example or less atmosphere to make deorbiting easier).

 

planed fetures:

Methane containd in the atmosphere can be used by certian engines to reduce fuel usage.

high enough oxygen levels will allow  airbreathing engines to work an kerbals to breath.

more oxygen =more thrust for jet engines(well kinda).

the densnes(?)  of the atmosphere will affect the poweroutput of solapanels.

extraction of methane and CO2 from soil and ice to modify the atmosphere

deorbiting asteroids release Nitrogen.

deorbiting coments releases water.

Importing water or melting ice to create oceans.

 

I don't know how to modify the visuals of planets so that will have to wait.

Feedback, help and questions are very welkome.

I dont have any screenshots or releases yet but I plan to publish the code on Github during development.

 

DOWNLOAD; BUILD AND USSAGE AT YOUR OWN RISK

IT WILL CREAT A FOLDER IN YOUR C DIRECTORY. THIS IS WERE IT STORES THE PLANETDATA (FOR  NOW). The reason for that is that I dont know how to make relative paths.  figured it out. THE VALUES IN THE FILES IS IN A VERY SPECIFIC ORDER AND IF YOU SWITCH VALUES STUFF WILL BREAK.

I will answer every question you have about the code.
